comments.body: Note that the existing test with the same query worked fine because `r` is a dataframe temp view, which doesn't have the `View` node.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +519,523 @@        sql("create view vr as select * from tr")
        checkAnswer(
          sql("select a, (select sum(d) from vr where a = c) sum_d from l l1 group by 1, 2"),
          Row(1, null) :: Row(2, 6.0) :: Row(3, 2.0) :: Row(null, null) :: Row(6, null) :: Nil)
      }
